subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: A leg injury prematurely ends the career of the horse who finished second in the Kentucky Derby and for whom trainer Bob Baffert had high hopes in the Breeders’ Cup.
snippet: A leg injury prematurely ends the career of the horse who finished second in the Kentucky Derby and for whom trainer Bob Baffert had high hopes in the Breeders’ Cup.
